programme.title: Mixed Dinghy Medal Race - MX Multihull Medal Race - Men's & Women's Kitesurfing SFs A & B, Finals Heats 1, 2 | Sailing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Marseille Marina - Corniche, and Marseille Marina - Frioul, on 07/08/24.
In Mixed Dinghy, Vadlau/Maehr (AUT) won Gold, Okada/Yoshioka (JPN) won Silver and Dahlberg/Karlsson (SWE) won Bronze.
In Mixed Multihull, Tita/Banti (ITA) won Gold, Majdalani/Bosco (ARG) won Silver and Wilkinson/Dawson (NZL) won Bronze.
In Women's Kite, Eleanor Aldridge (GBR) won Gold, Laudriane Nolot (FRA) won Silver and Annelous Lammerts (NED) won Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Team Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Team Final took place at the Bercy Arena, Paris, on 29/07/24. Team Japan won Gold, People's Republic of China won Silver, and the United States of America finished the podium.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Men's Sabre Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Sabre Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 31/07/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, the Republic of Korea won the Golf over Hungary, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, France took the Bronze over Iran.

programme.title: The (Body) Art of a Fencer: Miles Chamley-Watson ft. Noma Han
programme.desc: Fencing is a creative Olympic sport. Miles Chamley-Watson knows better to have Noma Han, his creative muse and tattoo artist, on his team.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's Greco-Roman & Women's Freestyle - Day 12 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's Greco-Roman 67kg and 87kg Semifinals and the Greco-Roman 77kg and 97kg Finals as well as the Women's Freestyle 53kg Semifinals and the Freestyle 50kg Finals.

programme.title: Paris 2024 Memories | Episode 3
programme.desc: Relive with us the best moments of Paris, exclusive content from the 2024 Games where you can experience firsthand the excitement felt by the athletes from interviews to clips that will show you what is behind the Olympic Games.

programme.title: Men's Bronze Medal Match IND-ESP | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Bronze ,Medal Match with India and Spain took place on the 08/08/2024 at the Yves-du-Manoir Stadium - 2. Final Score IND 2:1 ESP.

programme.title: Fashion Olympics: Rebels
programme.desc: See how rebels on and off the field broke through limits by using fashion to share bold new ideas.

programme.title: FRA-ESP - Men's Gold Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match France v Spain, at Parc des Princes, Paris, on 09/08/24. Final score ESP 5:3 FRA.

programme.title: Paris 2024 Memories | Episode 3
programme.desc: Relive with us the best moments of Paris, exclusive content from the 2024 Games where you can experience firsthand the excitement felt by the athletes from interviews to clips that will show you what is behind the Olympic Games.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 14 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 14 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, Paris, on 09/08/24. It included the Final for Women's 4 x 400m Relay, where Team USA claimed the Gold. At the Women's Shot Put Final, it was Yemisi Ogunleye (GER) who would win the Gold medal. Later, at the Men's 4 x 100m Relay Final, it was Team Canada at the top, with the Gold. At the Women's 400m Final, Marileidy Paulino (DOM) claimed victory, and the Gold, while at the Men's Triple Jump Final Jordan Alejandro Diaz Fortun (ESP) took the Gold. At the Women's 10,000m Final, Beatrice Chebet (KEN) won another Gold medal, and finally, at the Men's 400m Hurdles Final Rai Benjamin (USA) claimed victory, and the Gold Medal.

programme.title: Arriba Cuba
programme.desc: An exploration of the past, present and future of sports in Cuba at a time of unprecedented change.

programme.title: Men's Triple Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Triple Jump Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 09/08/24. Jordan Alejandro Diaz Fortun (ESP) won the Gold with a distance of 17.86m. Pedro Pichardo (POR) won the Silver, and Andy Diaz Hernandez (ITA) claimed the Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Shot Put Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Shot Put Final took place at the Stade de France, Paris on 09/08/24. The Gold medal was for Yemisi Ogunleye (GER), Maddison-Lee Wesche (NZL) won the Silver medal and Song Jiayuan (CHN) won the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Women's 100m Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Final took place at Stade de France, on 03/08/24. Julien Alfred (LCA) won Gold with a time of 10.72sec, Sha'carri Richardson (USA) took Silver and Melissa Jefferson (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Anatomy of: Sport Climbing, Athletics 100m, and Freestyle Wrestling
programme.desc: In a sports science lab, we studied the physiques of sport climber Nathaniel Coleman, sprinter Tori Bowie, and freestyle wrestler J’den Cox to find out what makes them special at their sports

programme.title: Men's 50m Rifle 3 Positions Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Rifle 3 Position Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 01/08/24. Yukun Liu (CHN) won Gold with a total of 463.6 points, Serhiy Kulish (UKR) won Silver, and Swapnil Kusale (IND) won Bronze.

programme.title: Rafael Nadal at age 16
programme.desc: Sporting talent runs in Rafael Nadal's family, but by his mid-teenage years the mult-talented Spaniard was on the path to tennis stardom.

programme.title: Men's Gold Medal Match | Beijing 2008 Replays
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match was held on 17/08/2008 at the Olympic Green Tennis Centre, Beijing. Rafael Nadal (ESP) claimed the Gold with a 3-set victory over Fernando Gonzalez (CHI).

programme.title: Rafael Nadal at age 16
programme.desc: Sporting talent runs in Rafael Nadal's family, but by his mid-teenage years the mult-talented Spaniard was on the path to tennis stardom.

programme.title: Mergea/Tecau v Lopez/Nadal, Men's Tennis Doubles Gold | Rio 2016 Replays
programme.desc: Mergea/Tecau (ROU) 2/6, 6/3, 4/6 Lopez/Nadal (ESP)

programme.title: Alcaraz/Nadal (ESP) v Griekspoor/Koolhof (NED) - Men's Doubles Second Round | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This match took place on Court Suzanne-Lenglen, Roland-Garros, 30/07/24. Alcaraz/Nadal (ESP) won the match with a victory over Griekspoor/Koolhof (NED), 6:4, 6:7, 10:2

programme.title: Rafael Nadal at age 16
programme.desc: Sporting talent runs in Rafael Nadal's family, but by his mid-teenage years the mult-talented Spaniard was on the path to tennis stardom.

programme.title: Alcaraz/Nadal (ESP) v Krajicek/Ram (USA) - Men's Doubles Quarter-final | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This match took place onRoland-Garros - Court Philippe-Chatrier, 31/07/24. Krajicek and Ram (USA) beat Alcaraz and Nadal (ESP). Final Score 6:2, 6:4.

programme.title: Gonzalez/Molteni (ARG) v Alcaraz/Nadal (ESP) - Men's Doubles | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This match took place on Roland-Garros - Court Philippe-Chatrier, 27/07/24. Alcaraz/Nadal (ESP) won the match with a victory over Gonzalez/Molteni (ARG), 7:6, 6:4.
